endpoints.@comment: This endpoint enables the client to get a community profile (social)
This endpoint enables the client to send a follow profile request to a user profile (social)
This endpoint enables the client to send a follow profile request to a community profile (social)
This endpoint enables the client to get all communities a user profile follows (social)
This endpoint enables the client to accept pending profile requests (social)
This endpoint enables the client to get a user's pending profile requests (social)
This endpoint enables the client to block another user profile (social)
This endpoint enables the client to get a feed (user, news, notification) tied to a user or community (social)
This endpoint enables the client to delete a comment associated to a post (social)
This endpoint enables the client to create a comment and associate it to a post (social)
This endpoint enables the client to get a community profile (social)
This endpoint enables the client to create a community profile (social)
This endpoint enables the client to update a community profile (social)
This endpoint enables the client to delete a community profile (social)
This endpoint enables the client to retrieve a post (social)
This endpoint enables the client to delete a post (social)
This endpoint enables the client to create a post (social)
This endpoint enables the client to create a topic and associate it to a community profile (social)
This endpoint enables the client to get all posts tied to a topic name
This endpoint enables the client to get a user profile (social) by provided userID
This endpoint enables the client to delete a user profile (social) by provided userID
This endpoint enables the client to create a user profile (social) by provided userID
This endpoint enables the client to update a user profile (social) by provided userID
This endpoint enables the client to get all topics a user profile subscribes to
This endpoint enables the client to get all community profiles on the platform in paginated manner
This endpoint enables the client to get all user profiles on the platform in paginated manner
This endpoint enables the client add an affinity score to a post
This endpoint enables the client add an affinity score to a comment
